msbt.message: Is it true? We have company on the island today? Yay! That's awesome!
One of my bug friends told me that we have a visitor on the island! That's pretty cool, yeah?
I'm kinda nervous about having a guest on the island!Feels like we gotta be on our best behavior. I mean, a huh huh huh, if anyone knew how we USUALLY behave, they'd say, "Whatta buncha weirdos!"

I hope our company enjoys their stay on !I kinda worry that we don't have, like, a tourist board or anything worth having a tourist board forAny idea what a tourist board even is?<10_4 /> I heard someone say it on TV once.
Should I put something out for our visitor? Somesnacks? Or Maybeumsome snacks?First impressions are important.
I'm gonna introduce our company to all has to offer.The sightsthe soundsthe smells<10_4 /> Man, we got some gooooood smells around here.
Maybe I'll ask if they wanna see my snack-dust collection. I've got it all sorted out by mouth feel.
I've always wanted to be friends with folks from all sorts of places.Maybe I'll make a new friend today? That'd be pretty cool.
